      • transform

        public T transform(T s)
        If a message is sent locally across the event bus, this method is called to transform the message from the sent type S to the received type R
        Specified by:
        transform in interface io.vertx.core.eventbus.MessageCodec<T,T>
        Parameters:
        s - the sent message
        Returns:
        the transformed message

      • name

        public String name()
        The codec name. Each codec must have a unique name. This is used to identify a codec when sending a message and for unregistering codecs.
        Specified by:
        name in interface io.vertx.core.eventbus.MessageCodec<T,T>
        Returns:
        the name

      • systemCodecID

        public byte systemCodecID()
        Used to identify system codecs. Should always return -1 for a user codec.
        Specified by:
        systemCodecID in interface io.vertx.core.eventbus.MessageCodec<T,T>
        Returns:
        -1 for a user codec.
